long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Marauder Bot - Your AI Co-Pilot for Online Technical Questions

Marauder Bot is an AI-powered Chrome extension designed to streamline solving technical questions on the web. It opens as a convenient side panel that automatically detects all open web pages, displaying each page’s title and URL, even if they are in separate Chrome windows.

With Marauder Bot, users can select any open page, and with one click, analyze its technical questions. Whether the page contains multiple-choice or algorithmic problems, the extension will parse the content, identify relevant questions, and provide detailed analysis and solutions, powered by advanced AI models.

Key features:

- Automatic Web Page Detection: See all open tabs across all Chrome windows.
- Technical Question Analysis: Choose a web page to analyze technical questions, such as coding challenges or quiz questions.
- AI-Generated Answers: Receive AI-powered answers and insights, instantly streamlining problem-solving.
- Efficient Workflow: No need to switch tabs or windows—everything happens in the side panel for easy access and multitasking.

Marauder Bot is perfect for professionals, students, or anyone navigating technical problems on the web. Whether you're studying for an exam, preparing for an interview, or solving everyday coding challenges, Marauder Bot helps you stay focused and efficient, reducing the time and effort spent on complex questions.

Install Marauder Bot today and supercharge your ability to solve online technical questions effortlessly!
